mapper.select: select tb.date_time dateTime, dq.forecast_produce dqPower, cdq.forecast_produce cdqPower, zr.actual_produce actPower, nwp.wind_speed nwpWindSpeed, nwp.pressure nwpPressure, nwp.temperature nwpTemperature, nwp.humidity nwpHumidity, nwp.wind_direction nwpWindDirection, wdc.wind_speed cfWindSpeed, wdc.pressure cfPressure, wdc.temperature cfTemperature, wdc.humidity cfHumidity, wdc.wind_direction cfWindDirection from wf_time_base tb left join wf_data_dq dq on tb.date_time = dq.event_date_time left join wf_data_cdq cdq on tb.date_time = cdq.event_date_time left join wf_data_zr zr on tb.date_time = zr.event_date_time left join wf_data_nwp nwp on tb.date_time = nwp.event_date_time left join wf_data_cf wdc on tb.date_time = wdc.event_date_time where tb.time_ratio = #{timeRatio} and tb.date_time > #{datePre} and tb.date_time <= #{datePost}
